alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Bighorn Canyon; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 28 at 5:02PM MST until January 30 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 to 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast Montana. Portions of north central Wyoming. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frostbite and hypothermia are possible if precautions are not taken. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will taper off tonight. Be alert for slick roads and sidewalks.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Bighorn Canyon; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
